name: Bloodheart
description:
A survival- horror game made by Rhina.

The goal of this project was to test our abilities and the game was made in 2 days.

Anyway, you're trapped in a jungle and must find a place to stay as you go further you find a pistol and something weird that seems like a heart.

In front of the heart someone has left you a strange note that says "Kill It",  it's your call!

Use "WASD" to move and "LMB" to fire if you have a gun.
